hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5280521ca8e3b6a86a0acbe141501c6ae2dc10f9)

 We have $8\text{ tens}$ and $11\text{ ones}$.

We can put our $11\text{ ones}$ together to make $1\text{ ten}$ and $1\text{ one}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a77555d2525d25efd874815d3b136105d0bde9ca)

In all, there are $9\text{ tens}$ and $1\text{ one}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/aa127670548050b717c76e5fd08d8f3290368db8)

$9\text{ tens} + 1\text{ one}= 91$
